channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-10912] LLAP: Exception in InputInitializer when creating HiveSplitGenerator
item.description:
2015-06-03 13:46:32,212 ERROR [Dispatcher thread: Central] exec.Utilities: Failed to load plan: hdfs://localhost:8020/tmp/hive/sseth/9c4ce145-f7f4-49c4-a615-28ce154f7f1d/hive_2015-06-03_13-46-29_283_23518

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
